channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court won't block California's law banning gun shows on state land
item.description: Supreme Court Justice Elena Kagan has denied a request from gun advocates to block a California law banning gun shows from state property.
